data.event: In 1687, Englishman Edward Davis reached the Playa Bahia Inglesa 6 km (4 mi) south of Caldera.

event.title: 1840, William Wheelwright of the Pacific Steam Navigation Company visited

data.event: In 1840, William Wheelwright of the Pacific Steam Navigation Company visited the region of Caldera.

event.title: was created in the year of 1851

data.event: On his proposal the first railway was created in the year of 1851 from Caldera to Copiap√≥.
The city itself was officially founded on 23 September 1850.
